title: Joel Taufaʻao
text:
Joel Taufa’ao (birth unknown) is an Australian <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who has played in the 2000s. He has played at representative level for <a href="Tonga%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Tonga</a>, and at club level for the <a href="South%20Sydney%20Rabbitohs">South Sydney Rabbitohs</a> (<a href="Reserve%20team">Reserve grade</a>) in the <a href="National%20Rugby%20League">National Rugby League</a> (NRL), as a .
Background.
Joel Taufaʻao was born in <a href="Newcastle%2C%20New%20South%20Wales">Newcastle</a>, <a href="New%20South%20Wales">New South Wales</a>, Australia.
Playing career.
Taufa'ao has also appeared on several occasions for <a href="Tonga%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Tonga</a> including at the <a href="2006%20Pacific%20Cup">2006 Pacific Cup</a> and <a href="Federation%20Shield">Federation Shield</a> competitions.
In August 2008, Taufa'ao was named in the <a href="2008%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup%20squads%23Tonga">Tonga training squad</a> for the <a href="2008%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">2008 Rugby League World Cup</a>, and in October 2008 he was named in the final 24-man <a href="2008%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup%20squads%23Tonga">Tonga</a> squad.
